title: Looking for something similar to this..... Geo Sans Light.
content:
I am looking for something similar to Geo Sans Light but I need more weights.

[http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/3272/previewphptextlookingfoli7.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072258/http:/img99.imageshack.us/img99/3272/previewphptextlookingfoli7.png "http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/3272/previewphptextlookingfoli7.png")

I like the x-height and the breathing room in there.

Please help with some suggestions!

thanks
author: mibi

comments.content: ah why didn't I think of that!
